x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: Connects learners with mentors or peers for skill-building sessions, supports ongoing learning and accountability, builds collaborative communities, and monitors skill development.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many people want to learn new skills but feel intimidated by formal classes or unsure where to start. Existing peer-to peer learning opportunities are scattered and hard to find, leaving motivated learners disconnected and unsupported.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • AES
  • Service Portal
  • Flow Designer
  • Report and Performance Analytics
  • Mobile Application

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Accurate user profiles with baseline skills
  • Tracking of skill levels or proficiency (begineers, intermediate, advanced)
  • Optional integration with learning resources
  • Scoring and badge system.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring the accuracy of updated skills
  • Coordinating sessions and avoiding conflicts.
  • Encouraging continuous participation
  • Keeping content fresh and engaging
